overview: Grigoris is Senior Vice President of Commercial Operations at Upstream. Grigoris oversees the successful delivery of Upstream’s mobile marketing campaigns and is responsible for the commercial success of Upstream’s engagements with clients across the globe. He has been with the company since 2006 and has held a number of positions in Business Development and Account Management – initially for brands and media clients and subsequently focusing on mobile operators. He joined Upstream from strategy consultancy Mars & Co, London, UK where he advised telecommunications and financial services clients on projects ranging from pricing optimization to organizational change management. Before that he worked as a senior consultant at the European Tech Labs of Accenture, Sophia Antipolis, France where he was part of a small team of professionals responsible for strategic research and analysis. He holds a B.Eng. and an M.Phil. in Electronic Engineering both from UMIST, Manchester, UK
